name: Robb Stark
description: If you win this combat, you may choose the area to which your opponent retreats. You must choose a legal area where your oppopent loses the fewest units.

name: Catelyn Stark
description: If you have a Defense Order token in the embattled area, its value is doubled.

name: Roose Bolton
description: If you lose this combat, return your entier House Card discard pile into your hand (including this card).

name: The Blackfish
description: You do not take casualties in this combat from House card abilities, Combat icons or Tides of Battle cards.
